message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, the money will be worth less to me in the next round due to inflation, while it maintains full value for you.

Alice, I think a 55-45 split is fairer, taking into account the inflation. We both get a decent amount, and it gives us both a chance to get something.  Let's avoid the risk of getting nothing in the later rounds!
